short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that integrates Perplexity AI into Google.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔥 Enhance Your Google Search Experience with Perplexity AI!
With the Perplexity AI for Google extension, get instant, precise answers directly from the Perplexity AI API to supplement and enrich your search results. Optimized for fast, relevant, and intelligent results—right above your Google search results!

💪 Key Features:
👉 Quick Answers: Receive instant, AI-generated answers directly within your Google search results.
👉 Seamless Integration: Easily add Perplexity AI to your Google search—no extra interface needed.
👉 Enhanced Overview: Compare Perplexity AI answers directly with your regular Google search results.
👉 Language Support: Answers are automatically delivered in your preferred language based on your browser settings.
👉 "Chat with Perplexity" Button: After viewing an answer, click the "Chat with Perplexity" button for deeper interaction and more details. You can dive straight into a chat to ask further questions.
👉 Simple Installation: Just click "Add," and the extension is ready to use instantly!

🥳 How Perplexity AI for Google Outperforms the Competition:
✔ Faster Access to precise answers from Perplexity AI directly alongside your search results.
✔ User-Friendly: No complicated setup—just install and start using right away.
✔ Multilingual Compatibility: Answers are adjusted based on your browser's language settings.
✔ Optimized for Google Search: Seamless integration into your familiar search environment.

❓ Frequently Asked Questions:
📌 What is Perplexity AI for Google?
Perplexity AI for Google is an extension that displays AI-generated answers right next to your Google search results. It uses the Perplexity API to provide fast and accurate answers.

📌 Is Perplexity AI for Google free?
Yes, the extension is completely free and does not require any additional registration or API keys.

📌 Which search engines are supported?
Currently, the extension is optimized specifically for Google searches. Support for additional search engines is planned for future versions.
